Title: Noodle Lunch Bowl
Ingredients: - 1/2 pound noodles - 2 carrots, peeled and chopped - 2 cups shredded cabbage - 2 cloves garlic, minced
Instructions: 1. In a large pot, bring 6-8 cups of water to a boil. 2. Once boiling, add the noodles and simmer for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. 3. Add the carrots to the pot and cook for 3 minutes. 4. 2 minutes before the noodles are finished, add the cabbage and garlic. 5. Drain the noodles after 10 minutes, and season with salt and pepper to taste.

Title: Scrambled Eggs with Green Onion and Cheese
Ingredients: - 2 eggs - 1 green onion, chopped - 1 tablespoon cheese, shredded
Instructions: 1. Crack the eggs into a small bowl and whisk. 2. Heat a non-stick pan over medium-low heat. 3. Add the egg mixture to the pan and stir constantly. 4. When the eggs are nearly cooked, add the green onion and cheese. 5. Stir and cook until eggs are cooked through. 6.

Title: Bacon, Egg and Noodle Frittata
Instructions: - Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. - Grease a 9-inch baking dish. - In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, eggs, and a pinch of salt and pepper until combined. - Stir in the bacon and noodles until well combined. - Pour the mixture into the greased baking dish and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the top is golden brown and a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean. - Let cool before slicing and serving. Enjoy!

Title: Savoury Egg and Sausage Breakfast Sandwich
Ingredients: Salt, pepper, eggs, ketchup, sausages, chicken, bread
Instructions: 1. Start by cooking the sausages and chicken until cooked through. 2. Toast the your choice of bread. 3. Crack the eggs into a bowl and season with salt and pepper. 4. Heat a nonstick pan over medium-high heat and add the eggs to the pan. 5. Scramble the eggs until they are cooked through and remove from the pan. 6. To assemble the sandwich, butter one side of the toast and spread ketchup on the other side, then layer on the cooked sausages and chicken. 7. Add the scrambled eggs and top with the other piece of toast. 8. Enjoy your sandwich!

Title: Pizza-Style Quesadilla
Instructions: 1. Preheat a large skillet over medium heat. 2. Place a flour tortilla onto the skillet. 3. Spread a thin layer of tomato sauce over one half of the tortilla. 4. Sprinkle generously with cheese and top with pepperoni and pineapple. 5. Fold the other half of the tortilla over the toppings and use a spatula to press down and flatten. 6. Cook the quesadilla for 2-4 minutes, or until golden on one side. 7. Flip and cook for another 2-4 minutes until golden brown. 8. Cut into wedges and serve.
